```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy import fftpack
>>> sig = np.array([-2, 8, 6, 4, 1, 0, 3, 5], dtype=float)
>>> sig_fft = fftpack.rfft(sig)
>>> n = sig_fft.size
>>> timestep = 0.1
>>> freq = fftpack.rfftfreq(n, d=timestep)
>>> freq
array([ 0\.  ,  1.25,  1.25,  2.5 ,  2.5 ,  3.75,  3.75,  5\.  ]) 
```
